define: To query income statement status and provide file link if the income statement is ready to be downloaded.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Wrong document ID provided. Please provide the correct ID in integer format.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Shop is not a mart shop. Please use Mart Shop ID.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.
